HornetQ QuickStart Guide

Putting the buzz in messaging

by Clebert Suconic (Red Hat, Inc.), Andy Taylor (Red Hat, Inc.), Tim Fox, Jeff Mesnil, and Howard Gao (Red Hat, Inc.)

Copyright © 2011 Red Hat Inc.

Abstract

This Quickstart guide will help you get HornetQ up and running in a few minutes and will explain the basics needed to get started.
